com.gnostice.pdfone
Interface PdfRenderFontHandler

public interface PdfRenderFontHandler

Method Summary
 java.awt.Font onFontNotFound(java.awt.Font substituteFont, java.lang.String originalFontName, int flags)
          Occurs when a font is neither embedded in the document nor found in the system's Fonts collection.
 

Method Detail

onFontNotFound

java.awt.Font onFontNotFound(java.awt.Font substituteFont,
                             java.lang.String originalFontName,
                             int flags)
Occurs when a font is neither embedded in the document nor found in the system's Fonts collection.

Parameters:
substituteFont - is the font that is created to use since the original font is not found in the system's Fonts directory.
originalFontName - is the PostScript name of the font.
flags - is an integer containing flags specifying various characteristics of the font. The value will be any/combination of the constant values specified in PdfFont class viz FLAG_FIXEDPITCH, FLAG_SERIF, FLAG_SYMBOLIC, FLAG_SCRIPT, FLAG_NONSYMBOLIC, FLAG_ITALIC, FLAG_ALLCAP, FLAG_SMALLCAP, FLAG_FORCEBOLD.
Returns:
font that shouls be used as a substitute. If null is returned then substituteFont is used to render the text.
